#include <vector>
#include <iostream>
#include <cmath>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;

int main()  {

    int t, n;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)  {
        cin>>n;
        vector <int> v(n);
        for (int i=0; i<n; i++) {
            cin >> v[i];
            cout << v[i];
        }
        cout << endl;
        int swap = -1;
        for (int i=n-1; i>0; i--) {
            if(v[i-1] < v[i]) {
                swap = i-1;
                break;
            }
        }
        if (swap == -1) {
            cout << "NO NXTBIG" << endl;
            continue;
        }
        int nxtbig = -1;
        for (int i=swap+1; i<v.size(); i++) {
            if (v[i] > v[swap]) {
                if(nxtbig==-1)  nxtbig = i;
                else if(v[i] < v[nxtbig]) nxtbig = i;
            }
        }
        int temp = v[swap];
        v[swap] = v[nxtbig];
        v[nxtbig] = temp;
        sort(v.begin()+swap+1, v.end());
        for (int i=0; i<n; i++) cout << v[i];
        cout << endl;
    }
    /*vector<int> v;
    int c;
    for(int i=0; i<10;i++)  {
        cin>>c; v.push_back(c);
    }
    sort(v.begin()+5, v.end());
    for(int i=0; i<10;i++)  {
        cout<<v[i];
    }*/
    return 0;
}
